installed_cost_source.notes: Low based on Philips 60W Equivalent Soft White A19 LED Light Bulb (4-Pack); mode based on EcoSmart 60W Equivalent Soft White A19 Energy Star and Dimmable LED Light Bulb (4-Pack); high based on Philips 60W Equivalent Soft White Clear A19 LED Warm Glow Effect Light Bulb (8-Pack)

product_lifetime_source.notes: Low based on Philips 60W Equivalent Soft White A19 LED Light Bulb (4-Pack); high based on Philips 60W Equivalent Soft White Clear A19 LED Warm Glow Effect Light Bulb (8-Pack)

_description: Typical wattage residential LED bulbs that meet the ENERGY STAR performance standard in 2015
_notes: Assumes standard bulb is for 60 W replacement
